text:
Hi guys, it’s my first time here! I need to do an integration of HubSpot with our ERP, I’m using <http://tray.io|tray.io>

 I need a HubSpot connector or some http request that can see when an email was sent in HubSpot, I don't know if anyone has ever done this. 

Thanks for your help!
This doesn't really have much to do with <#C2YH119N2|hubl>. Here's the link to the other message in <#C2YHAHB6K|api> <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1704311406672159>

Hi Guys 
I am facing some Microsoft clarity issues on HubSpot javascript, it's showing third party js are causing issue but that all are coming from Gtag and HubSpot form, can anyone help me in this please, if you need I will provide you tha detailed report
